name: Island Explorer (Mlockbug, Glorpie, BrotherEarth967)
description:
A short game about an explorer who has come to a foreign island with one goal, to find any civilization in this abandoned place, and if successful, help them develop to strive on their own. This game will require you to navigate through dungeons in varying difficulty to locate these creatures, some of which can also be found on the map, and rally them up and develop a town of their own.

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022, and is also my first completed project, so please do tell me about any bugs you may find and I will try my best to fix them.
